name: A.P. (DIR Series) Circular No.31
summary: This circular reviews and revises regulations for Foreign Portfolio Investors (FPI) investments in debt instruments. Key changes include modifying minimum residual maturity requirements, introducing a 30% limit on short-term investments, revising security-wise limits for government securities, implementing online monitoring through CCIL, establishing concentration limits for different FPI categories, and setting single/group investor-wise limits in corporate bonds. The circular aims to provide operational flexibility while maintaining regulatory oversight of FPI investments in Indian debt markets.
